tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: The charts show the percentage of boys and girls aged 5-14 taking part in cultural activities and sports in Australia in 2003.

images.altText: Chart showing percentage of children in cultural activities
Chart showing percentage of children in sports

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Today food travels from thousands of miles from the farm to the consumer. Some people say that it would be better for the economy & environment if people ate food produced from local farmers. Would the advantages of this idea outweigh the disadvantages?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
